thread.title: John Abraham to start shooting for Dishoom in November for the first time after injury!
thread.title_full: John Abraham to start shooting for Dishoom in November for the first time after injury!

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: John Abraham to start shooting for Dishoom in November for the first time after injury!
text:
John Abraham to start shooting for Dishoom in November for the first time after injury! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 23, 2015 at 3:07 AM Comments 
John Abrham has been in the news for not quite good reasons. First it was the news related to his alleged divorce which John dismissed completely to maintain that all is well in his paradise. And then the man suffered injury while pulling off stunts for his next. But now the 42-year-old has bounced back and is eager to shoot for his forthcoming project. ALSO READ: Good News! Sonam Kapoor & John Abraham to romance each other 
Abraham who recently injured his knee while shooting for Force 2 in Budapest is well on his way to recovery. The actor despite being advised a month of bed rest, is working under the guidance of a physiotherapist and will be back on his feet in no time. 
Sources close to the actor reveal that John will resume shooting for Dishoom in the second week of November in Mumbai. John has been in excruciating pain since his knee was badly injured but has been working hard on his recovery since he doesn’t want the Dishoom team to reschedule their dates. 
The actor’s injury has not affected the shoot schedule of the film and he is determined to come back better than ever for the action entertainer’s second schedule. 
  3:16 AM Topics:
